name: Lenmar CLZ313LG Replacement Battery for LG Xenon GR500 Cellular Phones

reviews.name: Lenmar CLZ313LG Replacement Battery for LG Xenon GR500 Cellular Phones
reviews.reviewText: This battery replaced the old battery that LG Xenon GR500 had in it. This new Lenmar battery holds a charge way longer than the original batteries that LG had in it. Totally satisified with this replacement vs. the original manufactured battery.
reviews.title: Replacement Battery

reviews.name: Lenmar CLZ313LG Replacement Battery for LG Xenon GR500 Cellular Phones
reviews.reviewText:
I replaced the original with an "OEM" battery from Ebay seller. It lasted ONE WEEK before it was just as bad as the original (charge lasted only a couple hours and would say "fully charged" after 15 minutes on the charger). Clearly the "OEM" replacements have been sitting on the shelf since I got the phone....5 years ago!

Batteries Plus wanted over $40 for a battery for my phone!!!!!

Found the Lenmar battery at Walmart online for around $12 !

Charged it when I got it......it lasted a FULL WEEK before needing charging! That is better than when the phone was new!

I really hope it lasts! Time will tell....and I will update this review.
reviews.title: Better than the original battery.......so far...

reviews.name: Lenmar CLZ313LG Replacement Battery for LG Xenon GR500 Cellular Phones
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new battery for an old cell phone that I still use as a camera because the old one held a charge for precisely one half of ten minutes. It fits my old phone, it holds a charge for days, it allows me to record video for as long as there is room on my SD card. It's exactly what you'd hope a new cell phone battery would be. Plus-- the price from walmart.com was $6 cheaper than any other source, and that includes the Lenmar website! I recommend.
reviews.title: It's exactly what you'd hope for.

reviews.name: Lenmar CLZ313LG Replacement Battery for LG Xenon GR500 Cellular Phones
reviews.reviewText: Bought this battery because my tween keeps jumping in the pool with his phone. This is great for the price.
reviews.title: Great for a kid that keeps getting his wet.
